web_snippets: BLACK DICE. BIO. Black Dice formed during the spring of 1997 in Providence, Rhode Island. At the time, Bjorn Copeland (guitar), Hisham Bharoocha (drums) ...
Black Dice is a band known for its experimental noise music, formed in 1997 and consisting of brothers Bjorn and Eric Copeland along with Aaron Warren.
Black Dice Biography by Fred Thomas. Beaches & Canyons Course setters of the American noise scene, Black Dice assume a different form on almost every album.
